DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective observational study evaluate hemoglobin level patient renal anemia 6 month treatment Mircera ( methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Observational Study Hemoglobin Levels Patients With Renal Anemia Treated With Mircera ( Methoxy Polyethylene Glycol-Epoetin Beta )
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Renal anemia treat Mircera least 6 month enter study Patients refuse incapable give write informed consent retrospective data collection
